thread.title: Man held after weekend mob justice murders
thread.title_full: Man held after weekend mob justice murders | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man held after weekend mob justice murders
text:
Johannesburg - A 35-year-old man was arrested and charged with murder after two suspected criminals were beaten to death by residents of Lawley near Lenasia at the weekend, police said.
Captain Tsekiso Mofokeng said residents suspected the two men of being involved in house robberies in the area.
“The community beat them [the two] and one of them died on the spot. Another one died later on in hospital,” he said.
Mofokeng said when they arrived on scene the community failed to provide them with information on how the incident started.
